OWASP.description: Performs a comprehensive security assessment, including active and passive scanning, to identify vulnerabilities such as SQL Injection, Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), and Remote File Inclusion. Supports authentication, AJAX crawling, configurable attack strength, and detailed reporting. Ideal for full application security evaluations with customizable test selection.

fullscan.description: OWASP ZAP is an open-source web security scanner that detects vulnerabilities in web apps and APIs,

ENABLE_ALPHA.description: Enables experimental scan features (not recommended for production).

ENABLE_IGNORE_WARNINGS.description: Ignores non-critical warnings in the scan report.

ENABLE_AJAX_SPIDER.description: Uses AJAX Spider to crawl JavaScript-heavy applications.

ENABLE_SHORT_OUTPUT.description: Generates a concise output instead of a full scan report.

ENABLE_PASSIVE_SCAN.description: Enables passive scanning (does not send malicious requests).

ENABLE_TARGET_URL.description: The target website for the scan.

ENABLE_SCAN_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout (in minutes) before the scan is stopped.

ENABLE_REMOVE.description: List of specific scan rules to disable.

ENABLE_DELAY.description: Time (in seconds) between requests to avoid detection.

passive_scans.name: Big Redirect Detected (Potential Sensitive Information Leak)
Content Security Policy (CSP) Header Not Set
Information Disclosure - Sensitive Information in URL
Information Disclosure - Sensitive Information in HTTP Referrer Header
HTTP to HTTPS Insecure Transition in Form Post
HTTPS to HTTP Insecure Transition in Form Post
User Controllable HTML Element Attribute (Potential XSS)
Server Leaks Information via "X-Powered-By" HTTP Response Header Field(s)

baseline.description: The baseline scan performs a quick security assessment of the target application by running a limited set of passive and active checks. It does not require authentication or aggressive scanning techniques, making it suitable for initial security evaluations.

ENABLE_ALPHA.description: Enables experimental scan features (not recommended for production).

ENABLE_IGNORE_WARNINGS.description: Ignores non-critical warnings in the scan report.

ENABLE_AJAX_SPIDER.description: Uses the AJAX Spider in addition to the traditional one.

ENABLE_SHORT_OUTPUT.description: Generates a concise output instead of a full scan report.

ENABLE_TARGET_URL.description: The target website for the scan.

ENABLE_SCAN_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout (in minutes) before the scan is stopped.

ENABLE_DELAY.description: Time (in seconds) between requests to avoid detection.
